body: Yeah, fck u Jung Pil, nobody wants to have sex with you anymore. Hope he gets kicked out of the group LOL
Idrc if he gets that girl he has a crush on, but he better not hurt his childhood friend. Like dude how dense are you.
This might be the single best fucking story in this whole website. Shit is next level. Give me moreeeeeeeeeeeeeee
10/10 would recommend the plot is good the girls are cute and it's wholesome but dirty at the same time it's a masterpiece and it's one of my all time favorites

This had quickly become an absolute classic. One of my all-time favorites. I only wish it came out quicker, I've never been one to watch each episode as it comes out and prefer to just binge an entire season, and its the same here. But I know I'll be checking out every new release of this as it comes out, and its partly for the story lmfao. 10/10 would read again
Top Tier shit. If only it was in the Japanese format and not Korean so that I didn't to spend effort scrolling and could focus on a page.
